verses.verse: And <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, which she <S%H3205>bare<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And when <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, he <S%H3947>took<s%> her, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her, and defiled <S%H6031>her<s%>. defiled: Heb. humbled her

And his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>clave<s%> unto <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and he <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3820>kindly<s%> unto the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>. kindly: Heb. to the heart of the damsel
And <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3947>Get<s%> me this <S%H3207>damsel<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: now his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were with his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> until they were <S%H935>come<s%>.
And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H1696>commune<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> it: and the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H6087>grieved<s%>, and they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>wroth<s%>, because he had <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H7901>lying<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>; which thing ought not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>.

And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> <S%H1696>communed<s%> with them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H2836>longeth<s%> for your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: I pray you <S%H5414>give<s%> her him to <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And make ye <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with us, and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto you.

And ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with us: and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>; <S%H3427>dwell<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> ye therein, and get you <S%H270>possessions<s%> therein.

And <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H1>father<s%> and unto her <S%H251>brethren<s%>, Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and what ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto me I will <S%H5414>give<s%>.

<S%H7235>Ask<s%> me never so <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H4119>dowry<s%> and <S%H4976>gift<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> according as ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto me: but <S%H5414>give<s%> me the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully<s%>, and <S%H1696>said<s%>, because he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>:

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, We <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> that is <S%H6190>uncircumcised<s%>; for that were a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto us:
But in <S%H2063>this<s%> will we <S%H225>consent<s%> unto you: If ye will be as we be, that every <S%H2145>male<s%> of you be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>;

Then will we <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto you, and we will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us, and we will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with you, and we will become <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But if ye will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto us, to be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>; then will we <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and we will be <S%H1980>gone<s%>.
And their <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>, and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H309>deferred<s%> not to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%>, because he had <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: and he was more <S%H3513>honourable<s%> than all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>.

And <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of their <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H1696>communed<s%> with the <S%H582>men<s%> of their <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

These <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H8003>peaceable<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us; therefore let them <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5503>trade<s%> therein; for the <S%H776>land<s%>, behold, it is <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027>enough<s%> for <S%H6440>them<s%>; let us <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us for <S%H802>wives<s%>, and let us <S%H5414>give<s%> them our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

Only <S%H2063>herein<s%> will the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H225>consent<s%> unto us for to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with us, to be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, if every <S%H2145>male<s%> among us be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, as they are <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>.

Shall not their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and their <S%H7075>substance<s%> and every <S%H929>beast<s%> of theirs be ours? only let us <S%H225>consent<s%> unto them, and they will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with us.

And unto <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and unto <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> all that went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>; and every <S%H2145>male<s%> was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, all that went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, when they were <S%H3510>sore<s%>, that <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H1783>Dinah's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H983>boldly<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> all the <S%H2145>males<s%>.

And they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> <S%H3947>out<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>. edge: Heb. mouth

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H2491>slain<s%>, and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, because they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.
They <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and their <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and their <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and that which was in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and that which was in the <S%H7704>field<s%>,

And all their <S%H2428>wealth<s%>, and all their little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and their <S%H802>wives<s%> took they <S%H7617>captive<s%>, and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> even all that was in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, Ye have <S%H5916>troubled<s%> me to make me to <S%H887>stink<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, among the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>: and I being <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>, they shall gather themselves <S%H622>together<s%> against me, and slay <S%H5221>me<s%>; and I shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>, I and my <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Should he <S%H6213>deal<s%> with our <S%H269>sister<s%> as with an <S%H2181>harlot<s%>?
